GradiantCardsData.title: Get Virality
GradiantCardsData.description: Convert customers to high performing ad creators in a matter of minutes

GradiantCardsData.title: Get Ad-worthy content from customers
GradiantCardsData.description: UGC content created by customers can then be repurposed into advertisements, providing you authentic and cost-effective marketing material.

HowDoesItWorkData.title: Setup reward programs
HowDoesItWorkData.description: Use our Shopify app as a plugin to give gamified actionable steps post purchase to ensure your customers share about their purchase with their unique link

HowDoesItWorkData.title: Shopper receives CTA at POS
HowDoesItWorkData.description: As soon as a shopper makes purchase, they get a pop up, email and SMS to get cash for sharing their purchase

HowDoesItWorkData.title: Shopper shares amongst followers
HowDoesItWorkData.description: Shopper shares their purchase with their followers and social circle

HowDoesItWorkData.title: Identify micro influencers amongst shoppers
HowDoesItWorkData.description: Dashboards to track sales, traffic generated and conversions for each customer sharing referral links

HowDoesItWorkData.title: Brands give out influencer style rewards - cash in the ripple wallet
HowDoesItWorkData.description: In case anyone purchases through the customer’s unique link, brands give them affiliate style cash reward after the return period is over.Your shoppers access a portal to access gamified rewards.

HowDoesItWorkData.title: Streamlined tracking sales & traffic
HowDoesItWorkData.description: Identify and incentivize customers with significant social media followings (over 5,000 followers) to become micro-influencers for your brand. Provide them with unique tasks and rewards to create user-generated content (UGC) at scale.

dashboardCardData.title: Reduce CAC & Increase ROI
dashboardCardData.description: Our user referral GTM is executed at about 65% lower CAC than performance marketing campaigns.

dashboardCardData.title: Incentivize users
dashboardCardData.description: Incentivize users at POS and automate post purchase rewards payout. Ripples is a SAAS you can set and forget.

dashboardCardData.title: Tap into new GTM channel
dashboardCardData.description: Brands these days are leaving so much revenue on the table by not tapping effectively into customer referrals as an acquisition channel.

testimonialsData.title: Founder, Clothing brand
testimonialsData.testimonial: Thanks to Ripples, we saw a 3X increase in customer-generated content and engagement. Our customers love the rewards, and we love the boost in brand visibility and sales!

testimonialsData.name: Samir Saxena
testimonialsData.title: Founder, Food Brand
testimonialsData.testimonial: Implementing Ripples was a game-changer for us. Not only did it lower our Customer Acquisition Cost by 65%, but it also turned our satisfied customers into influential brand advocates.
